page.title: 10RELIGION
page.content:
{RELIGION}-{HEADLEY PARK}AREA
There is an (Anglican Church) dedicated to St. Peter in Church Road which has a vicar, Rev. Peter Jacomeni and a Deaconess, Margaret Embrey. The Minister of the United Reform Church also in Church Road is Rev. A.W.J. Jeffreys. The Free Evangelical Church known as the Crossways Tabernacle at the southern end of St. Peter's Rise is administered by Mr. J. Higgins, and there is a Kingdom Hall of Jehovah's Witnesses opposite the swimming pool in Headley Lane in the care of Mr. Derek Patterson.
